alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Norfolk; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:01AM EDT until June 27 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT FOR ...THE CITY OF NORFOLK...THE CITY OF CHESAPEAKE...THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH...THE EAST CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK AND THE CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 159 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kempsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. Additional strong to severe storms were located near Fentress in Chesapeake and near Oceana in Virginia Beach. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. Around 145 AM EDT, quarter size hail was reported in Great Bridge. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of , the City of Norfolk, the City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth, the east central City of Suffolk and the City of Virginia Beach, including the following locations... South Norfolk, Rudee Heights, Portlock, Mount Pleasant, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Herberts Corner, Oceana NAS and Munden. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Chesapeake; City of Norfolk; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; City of Virginia Beach
